title: Beastly Tales...or something of that nature
description: In the eye of the night, she is the shadow, who watches the creatures pass by and remembers them. Her fingers clutch the pen and splatter ink across princesses' bodies. She has taken her love of the dark feminine and the fey and the adventure and turned it to write about all the strange, fabulous, unexpected in this world and in other worlds. The writing has been collected and pools into the pages of Beastly Tales. Explore the dark underbelly of the city night or visit a future planet earth. Find out what really happened to Jack's cow and Cinderella's glass slipper. Howl with the coyote and weep with the eagle in this collection of tales by the mistress of the dark and skulking. Beastly Tales is a compilation of tales.Some are fairy tales retold,Some are urban fairy tales,Some are tales in space,Some are just tales...
author: Mary C. Moore
